title: [Medicine] How the immune system alters our behavior - mice sensitized to have allergic reactions to a protein tended to avoid water laced with it. However, when IgE antibodies, produced by the immune system, were blocked, the same mice no longer avoided the allergen.

[Medicine] Plasmodium vivax is the second most common cause of malaria in humans and currently lacks an effective vaccine. A new vaccine elicited the highest antibody responses and reduced parasite multiplication after controlled human malaria infection by 51% compared with unvaccinated controls.
